articles.description: Both AirPods 3 and a new 10.2-inch iPad could launch in the next eight months
articles.content: Hot on the heels of his iPhone 13 battery bombshell, TFI Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has some more news of upcoming Apple products. And, unlike the still distant iPhone 13, these ones are due to … [+2340 chars]

articles.title: Oppo teases rollable phone with retractable display - Android Authority
articles.description: Could Oppo beat LG to market with an upcoming rollable, retractable phone?
articles.content:
• Oppo has teased a new phone with a retractable display.
  • The company will show it off on November 17 at its Inno Day tech event.
  • This wouldnt be the only rollable phone in the … [+1611 chars]

articles.author: Mark Serrels
articles.title: 8 PS5 UI tips and tricks to get the most out of your new PlayStation - CNET
articles.description: Power settings, sub menus, this thing even has spoiler settings!
articles.content: The PS5 is finally here and while games are undoubtedly the most important part of any console launch, the PS5's new user interface is a treasure trove of pretty cool new options. We had an in-depth … [+5654 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Apple might be sending you a holiday gift this year! - PhoneArena
articles.description: Twitter tipster "LOvetodream" posted a tweet that says Apple is planning on distributing a surprise this holiday season. No, you're not going to find a free iPhone 12 Pro Max under the tree!
